channel.title: [PI] Firemaking project
channel.description: Ok, I am working on getting Firemaking at 100%, so I've activated it already, and I have a few questions, I've searched around the google and found that I need to add global objects when I firemake, but do i need models and stuff for the fire? If you could tell me where to start on this project please do.

item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97

I know, that’s the only progress Ive made on firemaking… Lol I was able to activate it…

                                c.getFiremaking().checkLogType(itemUsed, useWith);

That is where the item used on tinder box is executed.

item.title: [PI] Firemaking project
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“Pure Slay, post:37, topic:414258”][quote author=imsuperman05 link=topic=516222.msg3747121#msg3747121 date=1315770927]
He went to college and studied other basic languages i think one is called “basic” or something… But their all basically the same, so he knows a lot about Java and some languages too. He had to study Java for one of his jobs.
[/quote]

BASIC, Just BASIC, any BASIC off spring is a complete joke. I’m taking a programming design class and they do Just BASIC. All you do is
IF
ELSE
GOTO

It has to be one of the most ugly looking languages I have ever used. + All your TI Math calculators have what they call TI BASIC, which is a good way to get started if you want to be bored to death.

On topic, post your UseItem class, it should be in your item folder.[/quote]
nah nvm i just actually asked, he learned Basic in college, and C#. He learned all the languages after college though like Java, C++, and some others.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Firemaking project
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

[quote=“Pure Slay, post:37, topic:414258”][quote author=imsuperman05 link=topic=516222.msg3747121#msg3747121 date=1315770927]
[/quote]

On topic, post your UseItem class, it should be in your item folder.[/quote]
here

[code=java]package server.model.items;

import server.model.players.Client;
import server.util.Misc;
import server.Config;

/**
*

  • @author Ryan / Lmctruck30

*/

public class UseItem {

public static void ItemonObject(Client c, int objectID, int objectX, int objectY, int itemId) {
	if (!c.getItems().playerHasItem(itemId, 1))
		return;
	switch(objectID) {
		case 2783:
			c.getSmithingInt().showSmithInterface(itemId);
		break;
		case 8151:
		case 8389:
			c.getFarming().checkItemOnObject(itemId);
		break;
		case 2728:
		case 12269:
			c.getCooking().itemOnObject(itemId);
		break;
		case 409:
			if (c.getPrayer().isBone(itemId))
				c.getPrayer().bonesOnAltar(itemId);
		break;
	default:
		if(c.playerRights == 3)
			Misc.println("Player At Object id: "+objectID+" with Item id: "+itemId);
		break;
	}
	
}

public static void ItemonItem(Client c, int itemUsed, int useWith) {
	if (itemUsed == 227 || useWith == 227)
		c.getHerblore().handlePotMaking(itemUsed,useWith);
	if (c.getItems().getItemName(itemUsed).contains("(") && c.getItems().getItemName(useWith).contains("("))
		c.getPotMixing().mixPotion2(itemUsed, useWith);
	if (itemUsed == 1733 || useWith == 1733)
		c.getCrafting().handleLeather(itemUsed, useWith);
	if (itemUsed == 1755 || useWith == 1755)
		c.getCrafting().handleChisel(itemUsed,useWith);
	if (itemUsed == 946 || useWith == 946)
		c.getFletching().handleLog(itemUsed,useWith);
	if (itemUsed == 53 || useWith == 53 || itemUsed == 52 || useWith == 52)
		c.getFletching().makeArrows(itemUsed, useWith);
	if ((itemUsed == 1540 && useWith == 11286) || (itemUsed == 11286 && useWith == 1540)) {
		if (c.playerLevel[c.playerSmithing] >= 95) {
			c.getItems().deleteItem(1540, c.getItems().getItemSlot(1540), 1);
			c.getItems().deleteItem(11286, c.getItems().getItemSlot(11286), 1);
			c.getItems().addItem(11284,1);
			c.sendMessage("You combine the two materials to create a dragonfire shield.");
			c.getPA().addSkillXP(500 * Config.SMITHING_EXPERIENCE, c.playerSmithing);
		} else {
			c.sendMessage("You need a smithing level of 95 to create a dragonfire shield.");
		}
	}
	if (itemUsed == 9142 && useWith == 9190 || itemUsed == 9190 && useWith == 9142) {
		if (c.playerLevel[c.playerFletching] >= 58) {
			int boltsMade = c.getItems().getItemAmount(itemUsed) > c.getItems().getItemAmount(useWith) ? c.getItems().getItemAmount(useWith) : c.getItems().getItemAmount(itemUsed);
			c.getItems().deleteItem(useWith, c.getItems().getItemSlot(useWith), boltsMade);
			c.getItems().deleteItem(itemUsed, c.getItems().getItemSlot(itemUsed), boltsMade);
			c.getItems().addItem(9241, boltsMade);
			c.getPA().addSkillXP(boltsMade * 6 * Config.FLETCHING_EXPERIENCE, c.playerFletching);
		} else {
			c.sendMessage("You need a fletching level of 58 to fletch this item.");
		}
	}
	if (itemUsed == 9143 && useWith == 9191 || itemUsed == 9191 && useWith == 9143) {
		if (c.playerLevel[c.playerFletching] >= 63) {
			int boltsMade = c.getItems().getItemAmount(itemUsed) > c.getItems().getItemAmount(useWith) ? c.getItems().getItemAmount(useWith) : c.getItems().getItemAmount(itemUsed);
			c.getItems().deleteItem(useWith, c.getItems().getItemSlot(useWith), boltsMade);
			c.getItems().deleteItem(itemUsed, c.getItems().getItemSlot(itemUsed), boltsMade);
			c.getItems().addItem(9242, boltsMade);
			c.getPA().addSkillXP(boltsMade * 7 * Config.FLETCHING_EXPERIENCE, c.playerFletching);
		} else {
			c.sendMessage("You need a fletching level of 63 to fletch this item.");
		}		
	}
	if (itemUsed == 9143 && useWith == 9192 || itemUsed == 9192 && useWith == 9143) {
		if (c.playerLevel[c.playerFletching] >= 65) {
			int boltsMade = c.getItems().getItemAmount(itemUsed) > c.getItems().getItemAmount(useWith) ? c.getItems().getItemAmount(useWith) : c.getItems().getItemAmount(itemUsed);
			c.getItems().deleteItem(useWith, c.getItems().getItemSlot(useWith), boltsMade);
			c.getItems().deleteItem(itemUsed, c.getItems().getItemSlot(itemUsed), boltsMade);
			c.getItems().addItem(9243, boltsMade);
			c.getPA().addSkillXP(boltsMade * 7 * Config.FLETCHING_EXPERIENCE, c.playerFletching);
		} else {
			c.sendMessage("You need a fletching level of 65 to fletch this item.");
		}		
	}
	if (itemUsed == 9144 && useWith == 9193 || itemUsed == 9193 && useWith == 9144) {
		if (c.playerLevel[c.playerFletching] >= 71) {
			int boltsMade = c.getItems().getItemAmount(itemUsed) > c.getItems().getItemAmount(useWith) ? c.getItems().getItemAmount(useWith) : c.getItems().getItemAmount(itemUsed);
			c.getItems().deleteItem(useWith, c.getItems().getItemSlot(useWith), boltsMade);
			c.getItems().deleteItem(itemUsed, c.getItems().getItemSlot(itemUsed), boltsMade);
			c.getItems().addItem(9244, boltsMade);
			c.getPA().addSkillXP(boltsMade * 10 * Config.FLETCHING_EXPERIENCE, c.playerFletching);
		} else {
			c.sendMessage("You need a fletching level of 71 to fletch this item.");
		}		
	}
	if (itemUsed == 9144 && useWith == 9194 || itemUsed == 9194 && useWith == 9144) {
		if (c.playerLevel[c.playerFletching] >= 58) {
			int boltsMade = c.getItems().getItemAmount(itemUsed) > c.getItems().getItemAmount(useWith) ? c.getItems().getItemAmount(useWith) : c.getItems().getItemAmount(itemUsed);
			c.getItems().deleteItem(useWith, c.getItems().getItemSlot(useWith), boltsMade);
			c.getItems().deleteItem(itemUsed, c.getItems().getItemSlot(itemUsed), boltsMade);
			c.getItems().addItem(9245, boltsMade);
			c.getPA().addSkillXP(boltsMade * 13 * Config.FLETCHING_EXPERIENCE, c.playerFletching);
		} else {
			c.sendMessage("You need a fletching level of 58 to fletch this item.");
		}		
	}
	if (itemUsed == 1601 && useWith == 1755 || itemUsed == 1755 && useWith == 1601) {
		if (c.playerLevel[c.playerFletching] >= 63) {
			c.getItems().deleteItem(1601, c.getItems().getItemSlot(1601), 1);
			c.getItems().addItem(9192, 15);
			c.getPA().addSkillXP(8 * Config.FLETCHING_EXPERIENCE, c.playerFletching);
		} else {
			c.sendMessage("You need a fletching level of 63 to fletch this item.");
		}
	}
	if (itemUsed == 1607 && useWith == 1755 || itemUsed == 1755 && useWith == 1607) {
		if (c.playerLevel[c.playerFletching] >= 65) {
			c.getItems().deleteItem(1607, c.getItems().getItemSlot(1607), 1);
			c.getItems().addItem(9189, 15);
			c.getPA().addSkillXP(8 * Config.FLETCHING_EXPERIENCE, c.playerFletching);
		} else {
			c.sendMessage("You need a fletching level of 65 to fletch this item.");
		}
	}
	if (itemUsed == 1605 && useWith == 1755 || itemUsed == 1755 && useWith == 1605) {
		if (c.playerLevel[c.playerFletching] >= 71) {
			c.getItems().deleteItem(1605, c.getItems().getItemSlot(1605), 1);
			c.getItems().addItem(9190, 15);
			c.getPA().addSkillXP(8 * Config.FLETCHING_EXPERIENCE, c.playerFletching);
		} else {
			c.sendMessage("You need a fletching level of 71 to fletch this item.");
		}
	}
	if (itemUsed == 1603 && useWith == 1755 || itemUsed == 1755 && useWith == 1603) {
		if (c.playerLevel[c.playerFletching] >= 73) {
			c.getItems().deleteItem(1603, c.getItems().getItemSlot(1603), 1);
			c.getItems().addItem(9191, 15);
			c.getPA().addSkillXP(8 * Config.FLETCHING_EXPERIENCE, c.playerFletching);
		} else {
			c.sendMessage("You need a fletching level of 73 to fletch this item.");
		}
	}
	if (itemUsed == 1615 && useWith == 1755 || itemUsed == 1755 && useWith == 1615) {
		if (c.playerLevel[c.playerFletching] >= 73) {
			c.getItems().deleteItem(1615, c.getItems().getItemSlot(1615), 1);
			c.getItems().addItem(9193, 15);
			c.getPA().addSkillXP(8 * Config.FLETCHING_EXPERIENCE, c.playerFletching);
		} else {
			c.sendMessage("You need a fletching level of 73 to fletch this item.");
		}
	}
	if (itemUsed >= 11710 && itemUsed <= 11714 && useWith >= 11710 && useWith <= 11714) {
		if (c.getItems().hasAllShards()) {
			c.getItems().makeBlade();
		}		
	}
	if (itemUsed == 2368 && useWith == 2366 || itemUsed == 2366 && useWith == 2368) {
		c.getItems().deleteItem(2368, c.getItems().getItemSlot(2368),1);
		c.getItems().deleteItem(2366, c.getItems().getItemSlot(2366),1);
		c.getItems().addItem(1187,1);
	}
	
	if (c.getItems().isHilt(itemUsed) || c.getItems().isHilt(useWith)) {
		int hilt = c.getItems().isHilt(itemUsed) ? itemUsed : useWith;
		int blade = c.getItems().isHilt(itemUsed) ? useWith : itemUsed;
		if (blade == 11690) {
			c.getItems().makeGodsword(hilt);
		}
	}
	
	switch(itemUsed) {
		case 1511:
		case 1521:
		case 1519:
		case 1517:
		case 1515:
		case 1513:
		case 590:
			c.getFiremaking().checkLogType(itemUsed, useWith);
			//c.sendMessage("Firemaking is disabled.");
		break;
		
	default:
		if(c.playerRights == 3)
			Misc.println("Player used Item id: "+itemUsed+" with Item id: "+useWith);
		break;
	}	
}
public static void ItemonNpc(Client c, int itemId, int npcId, int slot) {
	switch(itemId) {
	
	default:
		if(c.playerRights == 3)
			Misc.println("Player used Item id: "+itemId+" with Npc id: "+npcId+" With Slot : "+slot);
		break;
	}
	
}

}
[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Firemaking project
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

The Wanderer:

Post what it contains and I’ll explain it.

My ItemOnItem.java:

[code=java]package server.model.players.packets;

/**

  • @author Ryan / Lmctruck30
    */

import server.model.items.UseItem;
import server.model.players.Client;
import server.model.players.PacketType;

public class ItemOnItem implements PacketType {

@Override
public void processPacket(Client c, int packetType, int packetSize) {
	int usedWithSlot = c.getInStream().readUnsignedWord();
	int itemUsedSlot = c.getInStream().readUnsignedWordA();
	int useWith = c.playerItems[usedWithSlot] - 1;
	int itemUsed = c.playerItems[itemUsedSlot] - 1;
	UseItem.ItemonItem(c, itemUsed, useWith);
}

}
[/code]

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

[quote=“tyb97, post:23, topic:414258”][quote author=The Wanderer link=topic=516222.msg3746928#msg3746928 date=1315766588]

Matters how your server handles skills. Look for a folder named content or skills. Really just look for classes with skill names, and then create a class there with the name Firemaking.[/quote]
Like, I have a firemaking.java in my skills folder, would I just write up the enum’s there?

item.title: [PI] Firemaking project
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

[quote=“tyb97, post:23, topic:414258”][quote author=The Wanderer link=topic=516222.msg3746928#msg3746928 date=1315766588]
Construct enums for skills. They are very useful. We posted like 6 examples of enums. I suggest you learn how to code in Java first. If I were you I would start on a simpler skill. Like say herblore or prayer. Firemaking is very complex because you have to force the player to walk one position to the west, create an object, after a random amount of time you delete the object and replace with a ground item, you cannot make fires on top of other temporary fires, you cannot light fires on top of objects, and if you light a fire next to an object you will walk one space to the east instead.
[/quote]
I understand most of this, I’ve read a lot on java, but where do I start? Where would I write an enum at?[/quote]
Matters how your server handles skills. Look for a folder named content or skills. Really just look for classes with skill names, and then create a class there with the name Firemaking.

Read full topic

[/quote]

item.title: [PI] Firemaking project
item.dc:creator: @Pure_Slay Pure Slay
item.description:
@Pure_Slay wrote:

[quote=“imsuperman05, post:19, topic:414258”]okay leme get this straight.

[code=java] CURLY_ROOT(21350, 83, 120, 2732, 378.5, 1);

            private int logId;//this line represents the first number in this line^?
            private int level;//this line represents the 2nd line?
            private int life;//and so on..
            private int fireId;
            private int time;
            private double xp;[/code][/quote]

Order only matters in your constructor, after that you use your ‘getMethods’ to grab data what you need.

item.title: [PI] Firemaking project
item.dc:creator: @Pure_Slay Pure Slay
item.description:
@Pure_Slay wrote:

imsuperman05:

What’s the difference with arrays though? i kinda get it now.

Arrays are messy & slow. Why do something harder then it has to be.


package com.rs.game.player.skills;

import com.rs.game.Animation;
import com.rs.game.World;
import com.rs.game.WorldObject;
import com.rs.game.WorldTile;
import com.rs.game.item.FloorItem;
import com.rs.game.item.Item;
import com.rs.game.player.Player;
import com.rs.game.player.Skills;
import com.rs.game.tasks.WorldTask;
import com.rs.game.tasks.WorldTasksManager;
import com.rs.utils.Utils;

/**
 * Basic Firemaking Class
 * @author Emily
 *
 */
public class FireMaking {
	
	public static enum Fire {
		NORMAL(1511, 1, 30, 2732, 40, 20),
		ACHEY(2862, 1, 30, 2732, 40, 1),
		OAK(1521, 15, 45, 2732, 60, 1),
		WILLOW(1519, 30, 45, 2732, 90, 1),
		TEAK(6333, 35, 45, 2732, 105, 1),
		ARCTIC_PINE(10810, 42, 50, 2732, 125, 1),
		MAPLE(1517, 45, 50, 2732, 135, 1),
		MAHOGANY(6332, 50, 70, 2732, 157.5, 1),
		EUCALYPTUS(12581, 58, 70, 2732, 193.5, 1),
		YEW(1515, 60, 80, 2732, 202.5, 1),
		MAGIC(1513, 75, 90, 2732, 303.8, 1),
		CURSED_MAGIC(13567, 82, 100, 2732, 303.8, 1),
		CURLY_ROOT(21350, 83, 120, 2732, 378.5, 1);
		
		private int logId;
		private int level;
		private int life;
		private int fireId;
		private int time;
		private double xp;
		
		Fire(int logId, int level, int life, int fireId, double xp, int time) {
			this.logId = logId;
			this.level = level;
			this.life = life;
			this.fireId = fireId;
			this.xp = xp;
			this.time = time;
		}
		
		public int getLogId() {
			return logId;
		}
		
		public int getLevel() {
			return level;
		}
		
		public int getLife() {
			return (life * 600);
		}
		
		public int getFireId() {
			return fireId;
		}
		
		public double getExperience() {
			return xp;
		}
		
		public int getTime() {
			return time;
		}
	}
	
	private static int calculateTime(Player player, Fire fire) {
		int lightTime = fire.getTime() - player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.FIREMAKING) - Utils.getRandom(5);
		if(lightTime < 1 + fire.getTime())
			lightTime = 1 + Utils.getRandom(fire.getTime());
		return lightTime;
	}
	
	public static void handleFireMaking(final Player player, final Fire fire) {
			if(player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.FIREMAKING) < fire.getLevel()) {
				player.getPackets().sendGameMessage("You do not have the required level to light this.", true);
				return;
			}
			player.setNextAnimation(new Animation(733));
			final Item log = new Item(fire.getLogId());
			WorldTasksManager.schedule(new WorldTask() {
				public void run() {
					player.getPackets().sendGameMessage("You attempt to light the logs...", true);
					//World.addGroundItem(log, new WorldTile(player), player, true, 10, false);
					
				}
			});
			WorldTasksManager.schedule(new WorldTask() {
				@Override
				public void run() {
					player.getInventory().deleteItem(fire.getLogId(), 1);
					World.removeGroundItem(player, new FloorItem(log, new WorldTile(player), player, false, true));
					if(player.checkWalkStep(player.getX() - 1, player.getY(), player.getX(), player.getY(), true) == false) {
						player.addWalkSteps(player.getX() + 1, player.getY());
					} else {
						player.addWalkSteps(player.getX() - 1, player.getY());
						player.setNextFaceWorldTile(new WorldTile(player.getX() + 1, player.getY(), player.getPlane()));
					}
					World.spawnTempGroundObject(new WorldObject(fire.getFireId(), 10, 0, player.getX(), player.getY(), player.getPlane()), 592, fire.getLife());
					player.setNextFaceWorldTile(new WorldTile(player.getX() + 1, player.getY(), player.getPlane()));
					player.getPackets().sendGameMessage("... and light a fire!", true);
					player.getSkills().addXp(Skills.FIREMAKING, fire.getExperience());
					this.stop();
				}
			}, calculateTime(player, fire));
		}

}

Try writing fire making w/ arrays. That is smaller & runs faster then that.
